description: Akira is the roommate of Mai Tokiha`s younger brother Takumi Tokiha and attends the Fuka Middle school with him. Akira`s strong-willed and forceful personality contrasts with Takumi`s kind and (relatively) feminine attitude and is extremely private, setting up a curtain and strict boundaries for the room. Akira is also a student of Ishigami, the art teacher.
name: Okuzaki Akira
